description: A look at the latest results for Iowa and New Hampshire, and how this year compares to previous election seasons.
title: Who Is Leading the South Carolina Polls
title_page: Who Is Leading the South Carolina Polls - The New York Times
maintext: Polls were an unreliable guide in Iowa. Donald Trump was at the top of each of the last 10 polls in Iowa, but his lead failed to hold up. In the end, his seven-point lead in polling averages amounted to a three-point loss to Ted Cruz. Mrs. Clinton led most polls in the final week of the race, but she won only by the smallest of margins.
